predicate.note: Frames file for 'coagulate' based on internet usage examples, expansion via VN. VerbNet entry 45.4; comparison with 'ionize.'

role.descr: instrument or manner, if separate from arg 0

example.name: Intransitive
example.text: This stops the bleeding and the blood will then coagulate or thicken into a scab.

example.name: All Arguments
example.text: Mary-1 made delicious cheese; first *-1 coagulating the milk by letting it sit in a damp cave.
example.arg: by letting it sit in a damp cave
